name: Hungry Hungry Froggo
description:
created for the

Mini Jam 106: Frogs² 

programmation and "art" : MakeSan

Sound Design by Galactic Noise AKA Galaknoise

to play the game:

step 1: having a mouse

step 2: clicking on GO 

step3: the timer in top left corner goes down, hit regular flies to increase it from 1 but if you hit a bad flie then you get -5 seconds !

step 4: go to step 1 (yes, its a loop)
